reviews.text: Matt is a real Gem! He is a subject natter expert in the shutter repair business. He was quick, polite, efficient and knows his craft. Do yourself a favor and Call Matt if you need Repair work on your shutters. He repaired 10 broken slats and lubricated our 30 year old Magnolia shutters. They are like new now.  We are amazed!

Nicest, most courteous, professional, competent, reasonably priced, precise, high quality craftsmanship, reliable, trustworthy - I'm sure there is more I can say but this pretty well describes, Matt's Shutters. Ali runs the company now  which is one of the finest companies and personnel with whom I have ever done business. You will be highly satisfied to do business with him.

We love our new shutters! Ali was very quick responding to my inquiry (same day), provided an estimate, and came by to take exact measurements within a week. The installation turnaround was about 8 weeks which is expected but solid wood blinds is the way to go. We have the plastic ones downstairs that came with the house and these are much better quality so worth the wait. Bonus points - dog lover and his installation team was just as great!

Ali did a great job providing us with custom shutters for our front windows. He was responsive and easy to work with. The installers were quick, tidy, and friendly. They even fixed a small issue post-installation at no charge. Highly recommend!

They did a fantastic job fixing my shutters, at a very fair price. They went above and beyond to make sure everything was done properly and all the shutters were secured safely. They were very responsive and communicated well. I highly recommend.

Great experience. Now my go-to company for shutters, solar screens and shades. Anything to do with window treatments. Ali and his team got the job done with perfection, with utmost respect for our property.

I would give a million stars to Ali. He is such a professional and takes tremendous pride in his work. I had shutters that needed repair and his attention to detail has made them look brand new. He is a small business owner and deserves all the best! I whole heartedly recommend Matt's Shutters.

Matt's Shutters is far and away one of the best vendors I have come across for my home. We initially had a mini blind that needed repair. Ali came out, on time, and was able to take care of the issue. He mentioned that they also did shutters if we ever wanted to replace the blinds. Food for thought. After a few months one of the blinds was acting up again and we called Ali. He did his best to make it work at no charge, but we would need to think about a replacement. I hadn’t thought about shutte

I was very happy with the results that Matt's Shutters & More provided.  Custom screens were built to match existing screens already on my home.  The ones we received were an exact replica of what we had on our home.  The quality of the installation process was also outstanding.  The install team even made sure all of my other screens were secure after they finished installing the ones they had custom made for my home.  I would recommend Matt's Shutters & More again and again!  Outstanding custo

Just had a great experience with Matt's!  I needed the string repaired on my mini blinds that controls the lowering and raising for the blinds.  They came out the same day and fixed it for me and were VERY reasonable.  Highly Recommend.  I'll definitely be calling them in the future for my window covering needs.

I was in a pinch and need my blinds repaired, I called several places only to be told that this break was very hard to fix and either they couldn’t do the repair or that they couldn’t fit me in. When I called Matt’s Shutters and spoke with Matt, I found him to be attentive and knowledgeable. He took my information and asked me for some pictures and then sent the request on to his son, Ali, who runs the business with his dad. He called me back promptly and was able to help me get my blind repaire

Ali made my 38 year old plantation shutters work like brand new! One of the louvres was broken and he fixed it too. He measured some of my other windows for window treatments and I may just update those window treatments. I have every confidence in this family owned long time company. The products are made here in the DFW area. Go local, go quality!

Probably the best experience I’ve had with a repair.  My shutters needed slats repaired and oiled.  Allie was so professional, took great pride in his work, and was so pleasant.  Prices were very reasonable.  All around would highly recommend.

After trying to get the salesperson/installer from another company here for quite some time for a repair of what they sold us, I finally found Matt's Shutters & More. Matt was more than happy to schedule us for a small repair job. His son came out and solved our months-long problem in 10 minutes...had the parts, the tools and the vacuum for cleanup!  A great family business that I will call again.

Matt was extremely helpful, patient, and professional from the moment he answered the phone until the end of the job. I love my new shutters! I really appreciated him taking the time to explain to me everything he was doing, as most of it was foreign to me. Great value and great service. Highly recommend.

I recently remodeled my home and furnished it with the best stuff mostly from Restoration Hardware and Cantoni. I’ve had designers come in and out, but didn’t need any of that when it came to my window treatments.

I wanted a modern look and something discreet for my window coverings. Ali recommended a roller shade with a metal fascia top and I fell in love with it. It is such a clean and contemporary look, and coordinates extremely well with my house. I got shades for my master bath and bedroom

Matt and his son came to fix my blinds last month and I found them both to be extremely kind and thorough. I had several broken slats throughout the house- the repair was much quicker than I expected and everything looks as good as new. I've worked with many contractors in the area and found none to be as prompt and personable as Matt; you'll notice a significant difference. If you care about quality and communication, go with Matt.

This place is phenomenal.  We needed to have some staples repaired and the tension tightened on quite a few of our plantation shutters that we use all of the time.  Ali came by and looked at everything and gave me a quote, they came yesterday to do the repairs and I just can't say enough about Matt's Shutter's.  They were on time, efficient, personable, trustworthy, their prices are fantastic!  I HIGHLY recommend this company.

I had a great experience with Matt. Very professional and efficient. We had solar screens installed and we can immediately notice a difference in our home. He was easily accessible and reasonably priced. Would recommend him.

Matt was great.  A lot was going on the day he came by to do his quote and he was very patient and friendly.  He took measurement for all of the windows and so if and when I decide to order the remaining solar screens, I can just give him a call.  Great Job Matt!
